Verses: 1 naan En Ullaththile Sollikkondadhu Ennavendraal: Vaa, Ippozhudhu Unnai Sandhoshaththinaale Sodhiththuppaarppen, Inbaththai Anubavi Endren; Idho, Idhuvum Maayaiyaayirundhadhu.
2 nagaippaikkuriththu, Adhu Paiththiyam Endrum Sandhoshaththaikkuriththu, Adhu Enna Seyyum? Endrum Sonnen.

3 vaanaththinkeezh Manupuththirar Uyirodirukkum Naalalavum Petru Anubavikkaththakkadhu Innadhendru Ariyumporuttu, En Irudhayaththai Gnaanaththaal Thetrikkondirukkumpodhe, Naan En Thegaththai Madhubaanaththaal Seeraattikkondirukkavum, Madhiyeenaththaip Patrikkondirukkavum En Ullaththil Vagaithedinen.
4 naan Periya Velaigalai Seydhen; Enakkaaga Veedugalaik Kattinen, Dhraatchaththottangalai Naattinen.
5 enakkaagath Thottangalaiyum Singaarangalaiyum Undaakki, Avaigalil Sagalavagaik Kanivirutchangalaiyum Naattinen.
6 marangal Payiraagum Thoppukku Neerppaaichchugiradharkuk Kulangalai Undupanninen.
7 velaikkaararaiyum Velaikkaarigalaiyum Sambaadhiththen; Veettilum Velaikkaarar Pirandhaargal; Enakkumun Erusalemilirundha Ellaaraippaarkkilum Aadu Mudhalaana Thiranda Aasthigal Enakku Irundhadhu.

8 velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum, Raajasambaththaiyum Maagaanangalilulla Porulgalaiyum Segariththen; Sangeedhakkaararaiyum Sangeedhakkaarigalaiyum, Manupuththirarukku Inbamaana Palavidha Vaaththiyangalaiyum Sambaadhiththen.
9 enakkumun Erusalemilirundha Ellaaraippaarkkilum Naan Periyavanum Thiraviya Sambannanumaanen; En Gnaanam Ennodekooda Irundhadhu.

10 en Kangal Ichchiththavaigalil Ondraiyum Naan Avaigalukkuth Thadaipannavillai, En Irudhayaththukku Oru Sandhoshaththaiyum Naan Vendaamendru Vilakkavillai; Naan Seydha Muyarchigalilellaam En Manam Magizhchchikondirundhadhu, Idhuve En Prayaasangal Ellaavatrinaalum Enakku Vandha Palan.
11 en Kaigal Seydha Sagala Velaigalaiyum, Naan Patta Ellaap Prayaasaththaiyum Kannokkip Paarththen; Idho, Ellaam Maayaiyum, Manadhukku Sanjalamumaayirundhadhu; Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Palan Ondrumillai.
12 pinbu Naan, Gnaanamaanadhu Enna Endrum, Paiththiyamum Madhiyeenamum Enna Endrum Paarththu Ariyumpadi Thirumbinen; Raajaavukkup Pinvarum Manushan Enna Seyyakkoodum? Seydhadhaiye Seyvaan.
13 irulaippaarkkilum Velichcham Evvalavu Uththamamo, Avvalavaai Madhiyeenaththaippaarkkilum Gnaanam Uththamamendru Kanden.
14 gnaaniyin Kangal Avan Mugaththile Irukkiradhu, Moodano Irulile Nadakkiraan; Aagilum Avargalellaarukkum Orevidhamaai Sambavikkiradhu Endru Kanden.
15 moodanukku Sambavikkiradhupola Enakkum Sambavikkiradhe; Appadiyirukka Naan Adhiga Gnaanamadaindhadhinaal Kaariyamenna Endru Sindhiththen; Idhuvum Maayai Endru En Ullaththil Enninen.
16 moodan Endraalum Gnaaniyendraalum Endraikkum Ninaivil Iruppadhillai; Ippozhudhu Irukkiradhellaam Varunkaalaththil Marakkappattuppom; Moodan Eppadi Saagiraano Appadiye Gnaaniyum Saagiraan.
17 aagaiyaal Indha Jeevanai Veruththen; Sooriyanukkukkeezhe Seyyappadum Kiriyaiyellaam Enakku Visanamaayirundhadhu; Ellaam Maayaiyum Manadhukku Sanjalamumaayirukkiradhu.
18 sooriyanukkukkeezhe Naan Patta Prayaasaththaiyellaam Veruththen; Enakkup Pinvarappogiravanukku Adhai Naan Vaiththuppogavendiyadhaagume.

19 avan Buththimaanaayiruppaano, Moodanaayiruppaano, Adhai Yaar Arivaar? Aagilum Sooriyanukkukkeezhe Naan Prayaasappattu Gnaanamaai Sambaadhiththa Sagala Vasthukkalinperilum Avan Adhigaariyaavaan; Idhuvum Maayaiye.
20 aagaiyaal Sooriyanukkukkeezhe Naan Patta Ellaap Prayaasaththinmelumulla Aasaiyai Vittuvida Vagaipaarththen.

21 oruvan Buththi, Yukthi, Nidhaanaththodu Prayaasappadugiraan; Aagilum Appadip Prayaasappadaadhirundha Veroruvanukku Avan Adhai Sondhamaaga Vittuvidavendiyadhaagum; Idhuvum Maayaiyum Periya Theengumaai Irukkiradhu.
22 manushan Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Irukkira Ellaap Prayaasaththinaalum Avanudaiya Irudhayaththin Ennangalinaalum Avanukku Palan Enna?
23 avan Naatkalellaam Aluppulladhu, Avaigal Varuththamulladhu; Raaththiriyilum Avan Manadhukku Ilaippaarudhalillai; Idhuvum Maayaiye.
24 manushan Pusiththuk Kudiththu, Thanprayaasaththin Palanai Anubavippadhaippaarkkilum. Avanukku Oru Nanmaiyumillai, Idhuvum Dhevanudaiya Karaththilirundhu Varugiradhu Endru Naan Kanden.
25 ennaippaarkkilum Sambiramamaai Saappidaththakkavan Yaar? Ennaippaarkkilum Thuridhamaai Sambaadhikkaththakkavan Yaar?

26 dhevan Thamadhu Paarvaikku Nallavanaayirukkiravanukku Gnaanaththaiyum Arivaiyum Inbaththaiyum Alikkiraar; Paavancheygiravanukko Thamadhu Paarvaikku Nallavanaayirukkiravan Vasamaai Vaiththuvittup Pogumporuttu Serththuk Kuviththuvaikkum Thollaiyai Avar Niyamiththirukkiraar; Idhuvum Maayaiyum, Manadhukku Sanjalamumaayirukkiradhu.
